DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine medium term efficacy safety profile inhale mannitol , also additional therapy rhDNase ( pulmozyme ) . In particular , assess impact : lung function ; airway inflammation ; sputum microbiology ; exacerbation ; quality life ; adverse event ; exercise tolerance ; total cost hospital community care ; cost-effectiveness .
